text: You are right. There are no independent media inside Russia at all. On newspapers are closed, all even sites and so on, which were independent inside Russia. They are closed. All these editors and all journalists are in exile. And it's very important to remember that there are no at all independent media inside Russia by now. I understand that while we're here in the United States discussing these, it's difficult to believe. Probably two or three of them can work in some ways now. Everybody in exile and a lot of journalists are called foreign engines. Part of our organization is called extremists. Me extremists as well, by the way. There's a rust warrant out there. Yes, there is.
